channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Announces an Extra 100 Percent Tariff on Imports From China
item.description: President Trump is ratcheting up the trade war between the United States and China, promising additional tariffs.

item.title: Trump to hike China tariffs to 130% and impose software export controls next month, as trade war reignites to nearly ‘Liberation Day’ levels
item.description: Trump said the U.S. will impose a 100% tariff on China "over and above any Tariff that they are currently paying."

item.title: Lay’s drastically rebrands after disturbing finding: 42% of consumers didn’t know their chips were made out of potatoes
item.description: New bags—matte-ified and designed to look like wood planks (like a potato crate)—will hold the chips with revamped ingredient lists.

item.title: Why Leaders and Workers Think Differently About Workplace Safety Risks
item.description: Safeguards on the job aren’t just about falls or broken equipment now. Employees worry about work’s impact on their mental well-being.

item.title: Manufacturing Companies Are Helping Employees With Child Care. Should Your Company Join Them?
